name: Space Crash (EvilGenius)
description:
Game Project 2 for the Coursera - Game Design and Development from Michigan University

Created by Richard Barnes of EvilGenius Games© in Unity 2021.1.11f1

The assignment was to take the base game we created throughout the course and make at least 3 modifications to it. I decided on the following;

  • New Menus
  • Music
  • Instructions
  • Enemies
  • Player
  • Animations
  • Level Layouts.
  • Boss Battle

Windows, Mac and WebGL support supplied. Windows and WebGL have been tested Mac has not.

Given a bunch more time I would have liked to implement a different control schema, more custom Enemies, and better sound effects.
